rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Poetry Ireland is an organisation for poets and poetry, in both Irish and English, in the island of Ireland. It is a public body that receives support from The Arts Council of Ireland (Irish: An Chomhairle Ealaíon) and The Arts Council of Northern Ireland. It was founded in 1978 by John F. Deane and is based in Kildare Street, off St Stephen's Green, Dublin. Its thirtieth anniversary in 2008 was celebrated by events all over Ireland culminating in an event at the Irish College in Paris.
